name: Wound Poison III
tooltip:
Wound Poison III
Item Level 48
Classes: Rogue
Requires Level 48
Use: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 30 minutes.
Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, reducing all healing effects used on them by 105 for 15 sec.  Stacks up to 5 times on a single target.  90 charges.
Max Stack: 20
Sell Price: 1 25
